Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s still entertaining to me because it was my childhood first movie like alot of people as far as I know.
A complete parody on itself and this genre with one monologue

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an example of creative freedom and timeliness, has just as much affection for bad puns than Ninja and loves violence especially one upping earlier movies with deliciously over the top fight scenes, but also a beautiful song by Barry Love (ascari love).
